summary: REQ-10 and REQ-11 appear implemented: a dedicated predefined-labels module is added exporting exactly the 12 required labels, and AdminUploadForm is updated to include a dropdown listing these labels that auto-populates the English label field while keeping the Hindi label input present/editable (as far as can be seen in the truncated diff). No evidence of Hindi UI strings being introduced.

hallucinated_features.description: Added helper type guard `isPredefinedLabel` (and `PredefinedLabel` type) beyond the requirement to export the predefined label set.
hallucinated_features.reason: REQ-10 only requires exporting the label set as an array (single source of truth). The additional runtime/type utilities were not requested.
